title: Investigate a Security Alarm
description: A fence perimeter intrusion alarm is triggered at night. The security control room operator must investigate.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alarm and identify its precise location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator's system shows an alarm from the fence line near the west gate.

tasks.description: Direct the nearest CCTV camera to the alarm location to visually assess the situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator pans and zooms a PTZ camera to the location but sees nothing unusual, suggesting a false alarm.

tasks.description: Dispatch a mobile security patrol to physically check the area and reset the alarm sensor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A patrol is sent to the location, confirms it was a false alarm likely caused by an animal, and resets the sensor. The event is logged.
